alert.note: Alert for Chilton; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:56AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Chilton and southern Shelby Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 255 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shelby County Airport, or near Alabaster, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alabaster, Pelham, Helena, Calera, Montevallo, Columbiana, Jemison, Thorsby, Wilton, American Village, Maylene, University Of Montevallo, Shelby County Airport, Shelby, Minooka Park, Alabama 4H Center, Highway 145 and CR 46, Camp Branch, Siluria and Alabaster Veterans Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
